mapper.select: select id, (sense_rate + time_rate + taste_rate) / 3 as total_rate, sense_rate, time_rate, taste_rate, review, created_at from review where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into review( store_id, reviewer, sense_rate, time_rate, taste_rate, review, created_at, updated_at ) values ( #{store_id}, concat('혼밥러#',(select count(id)+1 from review)), #{sense_rate}, #{time_rate}, #{taste_rate}, #{review}, now(), now() )
